attributes.action: Dealing with Rioters and Anti Social Behavior
attributes.additional_details:
The recent dreadfull behavior of thugs has shown that traditional methods of justice are not working for this underclass that have been let down by their parents.
A new method such as below should be debated
Such as the recent rioters they should :-
1) Be removed from their existing environment immediately
2) Re housed in secure accomodation where they can be taught respect and strict discipline ie; closed down service bases
3) After this 6 month period they enrole for a training of a skill, further education and how to intergrate into society.
4) After this 4 year period they will be on probation for a further 2 years as future guidance

Prime Minister you have been shown that you have a vclear mandate fromn the public to at last GET TOUGH ON CRIME
